title: Photo of Great Zimbabwe - evaluate visual source

content.description:
Great Zimbabwe

The photograph depicts a complex with a tall, elliptical stone wall.

Within the walled complex are several other stone structures.

Several large trees are inside the wall at one end.

The area outside the complex is grassy and open, and a few additional stone structures can be seen to one side.

Mountains, plateaus, and trees are visible in the distance.
Christopher Scott / Alamy Stock Photo
content.question:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

Describe one factor that contributed to the prosperity of a society in East or Southern Africa from 100 BCE to 1500 CE.

Describe one function of the stone architecture in the source. 

Explain one way the architecture in the source challenges misconceptions about early Africa.
